hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Umar:Evil omen was mentioned before the Prophet: The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "If there is evil omen in anything, it is in the house, the woman and the horse

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُتَّقَى مِنْ شُؤْمِ الْمَرْأَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What evil omen of a lady is to be warded off
